sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {Card, Typography, Divider, Stack, styled, CardActionArea} from "@mui/material"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const RecipeCard = ({name, servings, time, rating,img,recipe}) => { const RecipeCard = styled(Card)(() => ({ //recipe card styling backgroundColor: "#eeeeee", color: "black", margin: "5px", width: "100%", height: "300px", outline: "black", transition: "transform 0.15s ease-in-out", "&:hover": { transform: "scale(1.03, 1.03)" }, })); return( //recipe card object

{name}

Servings: {servings} Time: {time} minutes Rating: {rating}/10 ); } export default RecipeCard;
